mapper.insert: insert into XNHB_VM_WDLEVEL( CREATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, UPDATEDATETIME, SEQ, DESCRIPTION, WDLEVEL, WDRATECNY, ID ) values ( #{CREATEDATETIME}, #{CREATEUSER}, #{UPDATEUSER}, #{UPDATEDATETIME}, #{SEQ}, #{DESCRIPTION}, #{WDLEVEL}, #{WDRATECNY}, #{ID} )
mapper.update: update XNHB_VM_WDLEVEL set UPDATEUSER = #{UPDATEUSER}, UPDATEDATETIME = #{UPDATEDATETIME}, SEQ = #{SEQ}, DESCRIPTION = #{DESCRIPTION}, WDLEVEL = #{WDLEVEL}, WDRATECNY = #{WDRATECNY}, ID = ID where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select CREATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, UPDATEDATETIME, SEQ, DESCRIPTION, WDLEVEL, WDRATECNY, ID from XNHB_VM_WDLEVEL where ID = #{ID}
select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.SEQ, a.DESCRIPTION, a.WDLEVEL, a.WDRATECNY, a.ID from XNHB_VM_WDLEVEL a
select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.SEQ, a.DESCRIPTION, a.WDLEVEL, a.WDRATECNY, a.ID from XNHB_VM_WDLEVEL a
mapper.delete:
delete from XNHB_VM_WDLEVEL where ID in
#{item}
